overview:
Allison Rhodes is the Vice President of Communications for OpenDNS, leading all communications strategy and initiatives since the launch of the company in 2006, and spearheading the development and growth of the global OpenDNS community. Prior to her current position, she headed corporate communications for enterprise software provider HumanConcepts and held roles at public relations firm A&R Partners (acquired by Edelman), advising Adobe Systems on press and communications strategy.

Allison began her career as a journalist, working first as a reporter at the Kodiak Daily Mirror, a daily newspaper on Kodiak Island in Alaska, where she was awarded two State Press Club awards for journalistic excellence. Allison received a bachelor’s degree in journalism from California State University, Chico.

milestones.description: Added a new position as VP of communications.
